channel.title: A Talk with Zedeck Siew
channel.description:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MleuoVxMuChH0J4l3lw
We will be talking with designer Zedeck Siew about his forthcoming *Reach of the Roach God* project, *Thousand Thousand Islands*, *Creatures of the Near Kingdoms*, and more. We will have a Q&A after the talk. This session will be recorded and posted later. This will be happening Saturday 10/16 at 1000 Eastern time.
We ask that attendees of the session attendees mute and turn off their video.
Reach of the Roach God: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/centaurgames/reach-of-the-roach-god-part-of-a-thousand-thousand-islands
Topic: A Talk with Zedeck Siew Time: Oct 16, 2021 10:00 AM Eastern Time (US and Canada) Join Zoom Meeting https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83362351508 Meeting ID: 833 6235 1508

item.title: A Talk with Zedeck Siew
item.dc:creator: @brownorama
item.description:
@brownorama wrote:

Unfortunately, technical issues cut this short, but I live-tweeted a few notes:

twitter.com

Dan Brown (he/him) (brownorama)

Now watching, @edige23 interviewing @zedecksiew on @GauntletRPG Community Open Gaming. Zedeck is the co-creator of A Thousand Thousand Islands, a beautiful set of zines providing setting and inspirational material for RPGs. Highly recommend! athousandthousandislands.com
2:11 PM - 16 Oct 2021 3

Read full topic
